favourite.article: In Genesis, God said man is "very good", but in Ephesians, God called the church His "masterpiece". Praise the Lord we are His MASTERPIECE!! This shows that God is not looking for one individual expression, but a corporate expression! Saints, we cannot go on in the church life by ourselves. We all need companions to pursue the Lord with. I live, if you stand firm in the Lord; you live, if I stand firm in the Lord! Lord, do companionize us!
You have Christ dwelling in you, so I need you because you have Christ.
Never think your Christ is small! Christ needs you and so do we all!
cool SONG MAN
Wonderful song! It really touches me. I wonder if it has already been translated into Spanish. I'd love to sing it in Spanish and teach it to the saints in my city.

I want to encourage you all, Without your supply I would fall. Never think that your Christ is small. Christ needs you, and so do we all. I live, if you stand firm in the Lord. You live, if I stand firm in the Lord. My going on is for you, Your going on is for me, Not sep’rate entities, I need you saints desp’rately!

"NEVER THINK THAT YOUR CHRIST IS SMALL" He cares for you. Be strong in trials, He is taking care of you and will never abandon you. Brothers and sisters, my life is for you, yours for me. I love you as you love my Savior!!!!
Amen, brothers and sisters. I want to encourage you all. Without your supply I would fall. This song really touched me....
To me for you!
What a timely hymn for my group meeting tonight. We need to encourage each other. Never think that your Christ is small. Christ needs you and so do we all
What wonderful this is!!!
WE LOVE The Saints!
This song has always encouraged me especially as I am sitting now singing with other sisters. Oh what a sweet church life!
Thank You Lord for placing me in the Body.

Praise the Lord for this beautiful song that my Bible reading companion, V. has shared with me. I pray that this lovely song will touch many saints and encourage us all to praise the Lord for the church life and cooperate with Him for the growth of His cooperate building. Praise the Lord for the New Jerusalem!
Amen! I need you saints desperately!
We all need each other. We live if we all stand firm in the Lord!
Hallelujah for the saints! I desperately need you! Stand firm in the Lord!

I enjoyed this hymn because there was a time I almost backslid, but because of a certain sister that I'm shepherding, because of her going on, I was helped to go back to the Lord.
Our going on is really for the other saints. Don't think that your Christ is small, because that certain sister that had encouraged me is actually just new in the church life, but her going on has really encouraged and helped me. =)
Wonderful and so true.
Oh, praise the Lord. He just supplied me with life through a representative group of saints going on with Him throughout time and space!

Wow...I want to encourage you all, without your supply I would fall, never think that your Christ is too small, Christ needs you and so do we all. The Lord desires a corporate bride, our being together, loving the Lord together speeds up this preparation process-the bridizing process so we can meet our Groom that Day. Praise You Lord.

Philippians 4:1 So then, my brothers, beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, in the same way stand firm in the Lord, beloved. 1 Thess. 3:8, 12 Because now we live if you stand firm in the Lord...And the Lord cause you to increase and abound in love to one another and to all, just as we also to you....
I would like to dedicate this song to the saints in Candelaria, Quezon Province, Philippines. without your supply I would fall.
Wow! what a privilege to be in the Body! Saints I really need you. I can't go on without you all loving and pursuing Christ desperately! AMEN! LORD JESUS!
I really like this hymn so much. We are not alone! We are in the Body!!! I need you saints desperately!!!! We can't live without others, saints!

I want to encourage you all, without your supply I would fall. Never think that your Christ is so small. Christ needs you, and so we do all. We need each member of the Body. How wonderful that God has placed me in the Body which is the church today. The church life is the place to stay and there's no other home for me.

“But now God has placed the members, each one of them, in the body, even as He willed”.
Praise the Lord! We are “individually members one of another”. Each member is organically joined to all the others, and each needs the function of all the others. No member can live apart from the Body.
God is not after a group of spiritual and sinless people. Rather, He is after a Body. Only our being in the Body will have eternal value in the eyes of God.
Christ needs you, and so do we all.

Praise the Lord we are in the Body!! Praise the Lord we are members in the Body!! We are not members individually, our going on is not merely by ourselves but it is in the Body! How precious His Body, praise the Lord He has put us in the Body and the gates of Hades shall not prevail against the builded church!! Praise the Lord Satan trembles in the Body!! Praise the Lord we are in the Body now, and may the Lord keep us safe in His ark! Jesus is Lord!!
I really love this song because it reminds me always that I can't live, I can't stand by myself without the other members of the Body.

I am really encouraged by this hymn, especially now , I just lost both of my parents last month January 2 (My Mom),and on the 30th (My Dad). I really thank the Lord He placed me in the Body. Thank you saints (Philippines and Toronto/ US) for all your prayers and support.
It is indeed such a blessed reality that God has placed us in His Body. What a wonderful song this is, to stand firm and go on in the Lord!
The hymns are hymns of love for the saints. How we really need to love the brothers and sisters as God has placed us in the Body.
Amen. We need the saints in order to live. Thank You Lord for bringing the saints. The word of God is so wonderful. Dear Saints, we need each other in order to live. Amen.
Wow, wonderful hymn! Praise the Lord for putting us in His Body! "I live if you stand firm in the Lord. You live if you stand firm in the Lord."

We love this song because we love to be knitted with the Body of Christ. We are dependent on one another and can not live with out each other. Even when someone goes astray, the Lord misses that one and seeks him/her out. When that one comes home, we rejoice and send for the fatten calf. Thank you Lord that no member is ever forgotten because You remember us all.
Amen~Always rejoice! Thank You for Your arrangement in the body.
We should always be thankful that God has placed us where we are right now... It's such a privilege to be part of the building of God's house. AMEN!!!
